title: All 32 - Arizona Cardinals: Kyler Murray makes the outlook for the next decade look very bright with Will Leitch (Football 6/26)
description:
Happy Birthday Brinson! To talk Cardinals in the penultimate episode of 'All 32', Will welcomes old pal Will Leitch to discuss his favorite team. Kyler Murray is the focal point early on as the guys examine the learning curve during his rookie the season and the leap he is set to make in his sophomore campaign (3:30). Will (x2) also analyze Kliff Kingsbury's growth as a head coach (5:30) and the still-stunning DeAndre Hopkins trade (9:00). What do we need to know about the defense? Was Isaiah Simmons the right selection (13:45)? Leitch details what he would view as a successful season for the Cardinals in 2020.
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @williamfleitch
Subscribe to our Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
